name: SpaceBrawl (LevelUp)
description:
Party game project for Hemisféra LevelUp game development course.

Controls:

Player 1 (red):

move/rotate - Arrows

shoot - RShift

use powerup - RCtrl

Player 2 (blue):

move/rotate - W,S/A,D

shoot - Q

use powerup - E

Player 3 (green):

move/rotate - I,J/K,L

shoot - H

use powerup - N
